value.title: Java on Azure
value.excerpt: Start here and learn how you can build, migrate and scale Java applications on Azure leveraging Azure services, and using tools and frameworks that you know and love â€“ Spring, Tomcat, WildFly, JBoss, WebLogic, WebSphere, Maven, Gradle, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Jenkins, Terraform etc.

topItems.title: Introduction to Java on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Goal of this module is to welcome you as Java Developers on Azure. In this module, you'll begin to discover the opportunities for Java developers on Azure.

topItems.title: Choose an Azure service for deploying your Java application
topItems.excerpt: In this tutorial, you'll learn about running your Java applications on Azure, and choose the best option between Virtual Machines, Azure App Services, Serverless functions, Kubernetes and Azure Spring Cloud.

topItems.title: Create and deploy a data-driven Spring Boot Java application to Azure App Service with Spring Initializr and Maven
topItems.excerpt: Create a Spring Boot application, connect it to a MySQL database and then deploy to Azure App Service.

topItems.title: Deploy a Java web app to Azure
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn how to create a Java web application and deploy it to Azure App Service.

value.title: SC-300 part 2: Implement an Authentication and Access Management solution
value.excerpt: SC-300 part 2: Implement an Authentication and Access Management solution

topItems.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

topItems.title: Plan, implement, and administer conditional access
topItems.excerpt: Plan, implement, and administer conditional access

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
value.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

value.title: What can a managed identity be used for? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on managed identities for Azure resources, explains what you can do with a managed identity.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-identities-azure-resources   Try Azure

value.excerpt: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organizationâ€™s security posture.

value.title: Manage device identity with Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage device identity by using Azure AD join and Enterprise State Roaming.

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Strengthen authentication (conditional access) with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about modern authentication and the security benefits it provides to your organization, such as enabling multi-factor authentication and a passwordless environment.

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organizationâ€™s data.

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Secure your application by using OpenID Connect and Azure AD
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to enable users to authenticate in multiple systems by using their Azure AD identities.

value.title: Secure administrator accounts in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Protect your identities with Azure AD Identity Protection
value.excerpt: Use the advanced detection and remediation of identity-based threats to protect your Azure Active Directory identities and applications from compromise.

value.title: Enable identity protection in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Active Directory (AD) Identity Protection and ways to optimize the end-user experience while benefiting security.

value.title: Describe identity principles and concepts
value.excerpt: Describe identity principles and concepts

value.title: Explore the access management capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the access management capabilities of Azure AD

value.title: Monitor and report on security events in Azure AD
value.excerpt: Keep tabs on security events in your Azure AD resources by using built-in reporting and monitoring capabilities. Respond to events as they happen, and address security risks before they become a problem.

value.title: How to secure a Blazor application with Azure Active Directory | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to secure a Blazor WebAssembly application with Azure Active Directory.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft
